./.title: Introduction
./.body:
Introduction
Merlin Ring is an experimental project established on the Merlin Chain. We plan to create a PoW-based ERC20 and ERC720 token distribution protocol, establish a public Launch Pad, and use the funds raised to complete the production of Merlin Chain's first game, Merlin's Adventure.
The core of the Merlin Ring ecosystem is the Merlin Ring NFT. This is the first NFT based on the ERC721PoW protocol on Merlin Chain. Specifically, we innovatively use the PoW distribution mechanism to achieve fair distribution on the Merlin Chain for the first time. Merlin Ring is our ecosystem's genesis NFT. After the sale is completed, we will take snapshots at specific times based on the number of NFTs held and airdrop $MR to the holders.
$MR will serve as the official token of the Merlin Ring ecosystem, with no public sale rounds, and all tokens will be generated through airdrops. After the airdrop ends, the sales revenue of Merlin Ring will be used to add to the official liquidity pool and locked. The team's income depends on the token sales tax, which will motivate us to continuously deliver products. In the near future, $MR will serve as the official token of the game Merlin's Adventure and will be used for in-game item transactions.
Regarding the Launch Pad we will deliver in the future, what we can disclose is that the overall distribution mechanism will be based on PoW to ensure fairness. Similarly, holders of Merlin Ring and $MR can participate in staking to reduce the difficulty of participating in PoW, and specific details will be announced after the Launch Pad is delivered. Please see our Roadmap for more information.

Background.html.title: Background
Background.html.body:
Background
In the distant past, the legendary seer Merlin possessed a kind of magic never before seen by mortals, a magic that was hidden within a mysterious magical ring. As time passed, Merlin's name became legendary, but his magic and that mysterious ring continued to attract countless dreamers and adventurers.
On a night eroded by wind and rain, a group of adventurers discovered an ancient parchment in a corner of a long-forgotten library. This parchment recorded Merlin's magic and the secrets of the magical ring that concealed endless power. The hearts of the adventurers were filled with excitement and trepidation, knowing that this could be the greatest adventure of their lives.
Their quest for the magic was fraught with the unknown and danger. They had to cross desolate wastelands, climb steep mountains, solve ancient riddles, and face mysterious creatures that guarded secrets. But deep within their hearts, a belief drove them: as long as they put forth enough effort, Merlin's magic would look after them.
After numerous challenges and trials, the adventurers finally arrived at an ancient ruin. In the center of the ruin, they found a simple ring lying quietly on a stone pedestal. When one of them gently touched the ring, a powerful and warm force flowed through everyone's body. This force felt both familiar and mysterious, as if Merlin himself was guiding them.
At that moment, the ruin was filled with light, and a powerful magic enveloped them. It was as though they saw a vision of Merlin unfolding before them: "Brave adventurers, your perseverance and courage have touched the ancient magic. This power will accompany you from now on."
As the vision dissipated, the light from the ring became softer, and the adventurers knew that their lives would be changed by this adventure. Merlin's magic was not just a force but a guide, leading them to protect the world from evil.
This adventure deeply taught the adventurers that true power comes from the firmness of the heart and the protection of good. They continued their journey, carrying Merlin's magic with them, safeguarding the peace and beauty of the world.
And from a distant place, a voice seemed to whisper softly: "When courage and wisdom unite, the greatest magic is born."
Brave adventurer, are you ready to begin your adventure?

Vision.html.title: Vision
Vision.html.body:
Vision
The ERC721PoW represents an innovative improvement in the distribution model of ERC721 assets, incorporating a Proof of Work (PoW) mechanism to determine the distribution and Minting eligibility for NFTs. This innovative method of asset distribution can significantly improve the existing distribution issues on the Merlin Chain.
We believe that the Merlin Chain holds great potential, but one apparent issue is the unfair distribution of assets. In previous projects that adopted direct sales on the blockchain, those with substantial funds and technical capabilities often dominated, resulting in only a small portion of the real assets falling into the hands of genuine collectors. This could quickly destroy an excellent project.
By innovatively integrating the Proof of Work mechanism into the distribution on the Merlin Chain, this distribution mechanism ensures that all participants have a fair chance to mint our tokens. The Proof of Work mechanism has been proven to be the fairest and most secure distribution mechanism. Under this system, everyone must compute the hash of a transaction to qualify for Minting. We place all verification mechanisms on the blockchain, ensuring all transactions are legal, transparent, and open.
